sql.value: SELECT DATE(RFRSH_TMS) AS RFRSH_TMS FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INFO_RFRSH WHERE BNFT_PIN_NUM = ?
SELECT BNFT_PIN_NUM,BNFT_CASE_NUM,INDV_ACS_LVL_CD,VLD_LIVE_ARNG_FLG,CASE_MODE_CD,CASE_STAT_IND,PRIM_PRSN_SW,UPDT_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV_CASE WHERE BNFT_PIN_NUM = ?

SELECT A.BNFT_PIN_NUM,A.BNFT_CASE_NUM,A.CAT_CD,A.SCAT_CD,A.SCAT_SEQ_NUM,A.CUR_ELG_IND,A.BNFT_STAT_CD,A.CNFM_DT,A.ELG_BEG_DT,A.ELG_END_DT,A.ELG_IND,A.MA_DDCT_BAL_AMT,A.PYMT_AMT,A.PYMT_BEG_DT,A.PYMT_END_DT,A.PYMT_TYP,A.SC_BNFT_LVL_CD,A.UPDT_DT,A.VFCN_DUE_DT,A.MSG_CD_TXT,A.AG_STAT_RSN_1_CD,A.AG_STAT_RSN_2_CD,A.AG_STAT_RSN_3_CD,A.NF_ELG_RSLT_CD,A.NF_FAIL_RSN_1_CD,A.NF_FAIL_RSN_2_CD,A.NF_FAIL_RSN_3_CD,A.ORIG_ELG_IND,A.PREV_PYMT_AMT,A.FS_GRP_TYP,A.FS_FPL_130PCT_AMT,A.PGM_RQST_SW,A.PREV_SC_BNFT_L_CD,A.EMPL_VFCN_DUE_DT,A.INS_VFCN_DUE_DT,A.SMIRF_MO,A.SMIRF_ACTN_CD,B.FST_NAM,B.SEX_IND,B.BRTH_DT,B.MCI_ID FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG A, ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV B WHERE A.BNFT_CASE_NUM =? AND A.CAT_CD = ? AND A.ELG_IND =? AND A.CUR_ELG_IND = ? AND B.BNFT_PIN_NUM = A.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND B.DTH_DT = '9999-12-31'

SELECT A.BNFT_PIN_NUM,A.BNFT_CASE_NUM,A.CUR_ELG_IND,A.CAT_CD,A.SCAT_CD,A.SCAT_SEQ_NUM,A.VFCN_DUE_DT,A.ORIG_ELG_IND,A.MSG_CD_TXT,A.CNFM_DT,A.PGM_RQST_SW,A.ELG_IND,A.PREV_SC_BNFT_L_CD,A.EMPL_VFCN_DUE_DT,A.INS_VFCN_DUE_DT,B.FST_NAM, B.SEX_IND,B.BRTH_DT,B.MCI_ID FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG A, ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV B WHERE A.BNFT_CASE_NUM =? AND A.CAT_CD = ? AND A.BNFT_STAT_CD ='P' AND A.CUR_ELG_IND = '0' AND B.BNFT_PIN_NUM = A.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND B.DTH_DT = '9999-12-31'

SELECT A.BNFT_PIN_NUM,A.BNFT_CASE_NUM,A.CAT_CD,A.SCAT_CD,A.ORIG_ELG_IND,A.SCAT_SEQ_NUM,A.CUR_ELG_IND,A.BNFT_STAT_CD,A.CNFM_DT,A.ELG_BEG_DT,A.ELG_END_DT,A.ELG_IND,A.MA_DDCT_BAL_AMT,A.PYMT_AMT,A.PYMT_BEG_DT,A.PYMT_END_DT,A.PYMT_TYP,A.SC_BNFT_LVL_CD,A.UPDT_DT,A.VFCN_DUE_DT,A.MSG_CD_TXT,A.PGM_RQST_SW,A.NF_FAIL_RSN_1_CD,A.PREV_SC_BNFT_L_CD,A.EMPL_VFCN_DUE_DT,A.INS_VFCN_DUE_DT,A.SMIRF_MO,A.SMIRF_ACTN_CD,B.FST_NAM, B.SEX_IND,B.BRTH_DT,B.MCI_ID,A.FS_GRP_TYP,A.AG_STAT_RSN_1_CD,A.AG_STAT_RSN_2_CD,A.AG_STAT_RSN_3_CD FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG A, ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV B WHERE A.BNFT_CASE_NUM =? AND A.ELG_IND =? AND A.CUR_ELG_IND = '1' AND B.BNFT_PIN_NUM = A.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND B.DTH_DT = '9999-12-31'

SELECT A.BNFT_PIN_NUM,A.BNFT_CASE_NUM,A.CAT_CD,A.SCAT_CD,A.ORIG_ELG_IND,A.VFCN_DUE_DT,A.MSG_CD_TXT,A.CNFM_DT,A.CUR_ELG_IND,A.PGM_RQST_SW,A.ELG_IND,A.PREV_SC_BNFT_L_CD,A.EMPL_VFCN_DUE_DT,A.INS_VFCN_DUE_DT,B.FST_NAM,B.SEX_IND,B.BRTH_DT,B.MCI_ID FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG A, ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV B WHERE A.BNFT_CASE_NUM =? AND A.BNFT_STAT_CD ='P' AND A.CUR_ELG_IND = '0' AND B.BNFT_PIN_NUM = A.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND (A.BNFT_PIN_NUM = ? OR 0 =?) AND B.DTH_DT = '9999-12-31'
SELECT BNFT_PIN_NUM,BNFT_CASE_NUM,CAT_CD,SCAT_CD,SCAT_SEQ_NUM,PEND_SEQ_NUM,NTCE_TYP,RT_ID,RT_KEY_CD,UPDT_DT,VFCN_TYP,OTSTD_VFCN_TXT,NTCE_TXT FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_IN_PEND_VFCN A WHERE A.BNFT_CASE_NUM = ?

SELECT BNFT_PIN_NUM,BNFT_CASE_NUM,CAT_CD,SCAT_CD,SCAT_SEQ_NUM,PEND_SEQ_NUM,NTCE_TYP,RT_ID,RT_KEY_CD,UPDT_DT,VFCN_TYP,OTSTD_VFCN_TXT,NTCE_TXT FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_IN_PEND_VFCN A WHERE A.BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND CAT_CD = ?

SELECT B.BNFT_CASE_NUM,A.BNFT_PIN_NUM,A.FST_NAM,A.MID_INIT,A.LAST_NAM FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV A, ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV_CASE B WHERE B.BNFT_CASE_NUM=? AND B.PRIM_PRSN_SW='Y' AND A.BNFT_PIN_NUM=B.BNFT_PIN_NUM
SELECT BNFT_PIN_NUM,FST_NAM FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV WHERE BNFT_PIN_NUM IN (SELECT BNFT_PIN_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_MSG_HIST WHERE BNFT_CASE_NUM = ?)
SELECT DISTINCT CAT_CD FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG WHERE BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND CAT_CD LIKE 'M%'
SELECT B.SS_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV_CASE A, ~SCHEMA~ACS_USER B WHERE A.BNFT_CASE_NUM=? AND A.PRIM_PRSN_SW='Y' AND A.BNFT_PIN_NUM = B.BNFT_PIN_NUM
SELECT QSTN_NUM,LANG_CD,DEL_FLG,SECT_ID,SEQ_ORD,ANSW_TXT,QSTN_TXT FROM ~SCHEMA~ACS_CMN_QSTNS WHERE LANG_CD = ? AND DEL_FLG='N'
SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT PYMT_END_DT) AS HIST_MONTH_COUNT FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG WHERE BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND CAT_CD LIKE ? AND CUR_ELG_IND = '9' AND PYMT_END_DT >= ?
SELECT DISTINCT PYMT_BEG_DT ,PYMT_END_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG WHERE BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND CAT_CD LIKE ? AND CUR_ELG_IND = '9' AND PYMT_END_DT >= ?
SELECT DISTINCT BNFT_CASE_NUM AS BNFT_CASE_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV_CASE WHERE BNFT_PIN_NUM=?
SELECT BNFT_PIN_NUM,TXT_ID,CAT_CD,SCAT_CD,MSG_DT,TXT_ID,MSG_SEQ_NUM,MSG_TXT,LANG_CD FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_MSG_HIST WHERE BNFT_CASE_NUM =? AND(BNFT_PIN_NUM = ? OR 0 =?) WITH UR

SELECT A.BNFT_PIN_NUM,B.FST_NAM, A.PREV_PYMT_AMT,A.PYMT_AMT,A.MSG_CD_TXT FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG A,~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV B WHERE A.BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND A.BNFT_PIN_NUM = B.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND A.CAT_CD=? AND A.SCAT_SEQ_NUM=? AND A.PYMT_AMT > 0 AND A.CUR_ELG_IND = ?
SELECT FST_NAM, RFA_FILE_DT, RFA_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~ BNFT_INDV_RFA WHERE BNFT_PIN_NUM = ?
SELECT A.BNFT_PIN_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG A WHERE A.BNFT_PIN_NUM =? AND A.BNFT_CASE_NUM NOT IN (SELECT B.BNFT_CASE_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INFO_RSTC B WHERE B.BNFT_CASE_NUM = A.BNFT_CASE_NUM)
SELECT BNFT_CASE_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INFO_RSTC WHERE BNFT_CASE_NUM=?
SELECT BNFT_RGST_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~ACS_USER WHERE BNFT_PIN_NUM=? ORDER BY BNFT_RGST_IND DESC
SELECT BNFT_PIN_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG WHERE BNFT_PIN_NUM =?
SELECT ELG_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG WHERE BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND BNFT_PIN_NUM =? AND PYMT_END_DT>=? ORDER BY BNFT_PIN_NUM, BNFT_CASE_NUM, PYMT_END_DT DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY with ur

SELECT ELG_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG WHERE BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND BNFT_PIN_NUM =? AND PYMT_END_DT>=? AND CAT_CD = ? ORDER BY BNFT_PIN_NUM, BNFT_CASE_NUM, PYMT_END_DT DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY with ur
SELECT DTH_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV WHERE BNFT_PIN_NUM=?
SELECT DISTINCT BNFT_CASE_NUM, FILE_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV_CASE WHERE BNFT_PIN_NUM = ?
SELECT BNFT_STAT_CD, ELG_END_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG WHERE BNFT_PIN_NUM = ? AND CAT_CD = ? AND SCAT_SEQ_NUM = ? AND CUR_ELG_IND = '1'
SELECT BNFT_STAT_CD, SMIRF_MO FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG WHERE BNFT_PIN_NUM = ? AND CAT_CD = ? AND SCAT_SEQ_NUM = ? AND CUR_ELG_IND = '1' AND FS_GRP_TYP NOT IN('TFTT','TFW2')

SELECT A.BNFT_PIN_NUM,B.BNFT_STAT_CD,B.BNFT_CASE_NUM, C.CASE_MODE_CD, C.CASE_STAT_IND, C.INDV_ACS_LVL_CD, C.PRIM_PRSN_SW, C.UPDT_DT, C.VLD_LIVE_ARNG_FLG FROM ~SCHEMA~ACS_USER A JOIN ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG B ON A.BNFT_PIN_NUM=B.BNFT_PIN_NUM JOIN ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV_CASE C ON B.BNFT_PIN_NUM=C.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND B.BNFT_CASE_NUM=C.BNFT_CASE_NUM WHERE B.CAT_CD='CC' AND B.CUR_ELG_IND=1 and A.WAMS_INTL_USER_ID=? WITH UR
SELECT FST_NAM FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV WHERE BNFT_PIN_NUM =?

SELECT * FROM ~SCHEMA~PAPRLS_CRSPD WHERE (CS_RFA_PRV_PIN_NUM IN (?) AND CS_RFA_PRV_PIN_IND IN ('R','C')) AND MAIL_DT BETWEEN '?' AND '?' Union SELECT * FROM ~SCHEMA~PAPRLS_CRSPD where (CS_RFA_PRV_PIN_NUM IN (?) AND CS_RFA_PRV_PIN_IND IN ('I','W')) AND MAIL_DT BETWEEN '?' AND '?' ORDER BY MAIL_DT DESC, READ_DT DESC WITH UR
UPDATE ~SCHEMA~PAPRLS_CRSPD SET READ_DT=? WHERE CRSPD_SEQ_NUM=? AND CS_RFA_PRV_PIN_NUM=?
SELECT CASE_NUM,PAPRLESS_IND,EMAIL_ADR,EMAIL_CSNT_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV_CASE_CNT WHERE CASE_NUM=? AND PIN_NUM=? WITH UR
UPDATE ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV_CASE_CNT SET PAPRLESS_IND=?,EMAIL_ADR=?,EMAIL_CSNT_IND=? WHERE CASE_NUM=? AND PIN_NUM=?

SELECT DOC_CD FROM ~SCHEMA~PAPRLS_CRSPD WHERE (CS_RFA_PRV_PIN_NUM IN (?) AND CS_RFA_PRV_PIN_IND IN ('R','C')) AND MAIL_DT>'?' AND (READ_DT='9999-12-31' OR PRIM_P_SPS_READ_DT='9999-12-31') UNION SELECT DOC_CD FROM ~SCHEMA~PAPRLS_CRSPD WHERE (CS_RFA_PRV_PIN_NUM IN (?)AND CS_RFA_PRV_PIN_IND IN ('I','W')) AND MAIL_DT>'?' AND READ_DT='9999-12-31' WITH UR
SELECT BNFT_PIN_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV_CASE WHERE BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? WITH UR
SELECT ELG_END_DT,UPDT_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG WHERE BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND CUR_ELG_IND = '1' AND BNFT_STAT_CD IN ('D','C') WITH UR;

SELECT * FROM ~SCHEMA~PAPRLS_CRSPD WHERE ((CS_RFA_PRV_PIN_NUM IN (?) AND CS_RFA_PRV_PIN_IND IN ('I','W'))) AND MAIL_DT BETWEEN '?' AND '?' AND MAIL_DT<= '?' ORDER BY MAIL_DT DESC, READ_DT DESC WITH UR

SELECT * FROM ~SCHEMA~PAPRLS_CRSPD WHERE ((PRIM_PRSN_PIN_NUM = ? OR PRIM_P_SPS_PIN_NUM = ?) AND CS_RFA_PRV_PIN_IND IN ('R','C')) AND MAIL_DT BETWEEN '?' AND '?' Union SELECT * FROM ~SCHEMA~PAPRLS_CRSPD where (CS_RFA_PRV_PIN_NUM IN (?) AND CS_RFA_PRV_PIN_IND IN ('I','W')) AND MAIL_DT BETWEEN '?' AND '?' ORDER BY MAIL_DT DESC, READ_DT DESC WITH UR
UPDATE ~SCHEMA~PAPRLS_CRSPD SET PRIM_P_SPS_READ_DT=? WHERE CRSPD_SEQ_NUM=? AND CS_RFA_PRV_PIN_NUM=?

SELECT A.BNFT_PIN_NUM,A.BNFT_CASE_NUM,A.CAT_CD,A.SCAT_CD,A.ORIG_ELG_IND,A.SCAT_SEQ_NUM,A.CUR_ELG_IND,A.BNFT_STAT_CD,A.CNFM_DT,A.ELG_BEG_DT,A.ELG_END_DT,A.ELG_IND,A.MA_DDCT_BAL_AMT,A.PYMT_AMT,A.PYMT_BEG_DT,A.PYMT_END_DT,A.PYMT_TYP,A.SC_BNFT_LVL_CD,A.UPDT_DT,A.VFCN_DUE_DT,A.MSG_CD_TXT,A.PGM_RQST_SW,A.NF_FAIL_RSN_1_CD,A.PREV_SC_BNFT_L_CD,A.EMPL_VFCN_DUE_DT,A.INS_VFCN_DUE_DT,A.SMIRF_MO,A.SMIRF_ACTN_CD,B.FST_NAM, B.SEX_IND,B.BRTH_DT,B.MCI_ID,A.FS_GRP_TYP,A.AG_STAT_RSN_1_CD,A.AG_STAT_RSN_2_CD,A.AG_STAT_RSN_3_CD FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG A, ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV B WHERE A.BNFT_CASE_NUM =? AND A.ELG_IND =? AND (A.CUR_ELG_IND = '0' OR A.CUR_ELG_IND = '1') AND B.BNFT_PIN_NUM = A.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND B.DTH_DT = '9999-12-31'
SELECT MAIL_DT, CRSPD_SEQ_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~PAPRLS_CRSPD WHERE CS_RFA_PRV_PIN_NUM = ? AND DOC_CD = 'CVCL' ORDER BY MAIL_DT DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY WITH UR
SELECT FST_NAM FROM ~SCHEMA~APP_INDV WHERE APP_NUM=? AND INDV_SEQ_NUM=1
SELECT A.APP_NUM, APP_STAT_CD,APP_ABDN_IND, UPDT_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~APP_RQST A, ~SCHEMA~APP_USER B WHERE B.ACS_ID > 0 AND A.APP_NUM = B.APP_NUM AND ACS_ID = ? ORDER BY UPDT_DT
SELECT A.APP_NUM, STAT_CD, UPDT_DT, DATE(SBMT_TMS) AS SBMT_TMS FROM ~SCHEMA~RMC_RQST A, ~SCHEMA~APP_USER B WHERE B.ACS_ID > 0 AND A.APP_NUM = B.APP_NUM AND ACS_ID = ? ORDER BY SBMT_TMS WITH UR

SELECT A.APP_NUM, 'AFB'AS TYPE, APP_STAT_CD AS STATUS, UPDT_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~APP_RQST A, ~SCHEMA~APP_USER B WHERE A.APP_NUM = B.APP_NUM AND ACS_ID = ? UNION SELECT C.APP_NUM, 'RMC'AS TYPE, STAT_CD AS STATUS, DATE(SBMT_TMS) AS UPDT_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~RMC_RQST C, ~SCHEMA~APP_USER D WHERE C.APP_NUM = D.APP_NUM AND ACS_ID = ? AND CURRENT_DATE > (UPDT_DT + 30 DAYS) ORDER BY UPDT_DT
SELECT DISTINCT FST_NAM FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV A, ~SCHEMA~APP_USER B, ~SCHEMA~ACS_USER C WHERE APP_NUM=? AND B.ACS_ID = C.ACS_ID AND C.BNFT_PIN_NUM = A.BNFT_PIN_NUM
SELECT APP_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~APP_USER WHERE ACS_ID > 0 AND ACS_ID = ? AND ACS_ID NOT IN (SELECT UPDT_USER_ID FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INFO_RSTC WHERE UPDT_USER_ID = ?)
SELECT BNFT_CASE_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV_CASE WHERE BNFT_PIN_NUM = ? ORDER BY CASE_STAT_IND DESC WITH UR

SELECT MCI_ID FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV A WHERE A.IC_FLG = 'N' AND A.BNFT_PIN_NUM IN(SELECT B.BNFT_PIN_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV_CASE B WHERE B.BNFT_CASE_NUM IN(SELECT C.BNFT_CASE_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV_CASE C WHERE C.BNFT_PIN_NUM = ?)) WITH UR

SELECT A.BNFT_PIN_NUM,A.BNFT_CASE_NUM,A.CAT_CD,A.SCAT_CD,A.ORIG_ELG_IND,A.SCAT_SEQ_NUM,A.CUR_ELG_IND,A.BNFT_STAT_CD,A.CNFM_DT,A.ELG_BEG_DT,A.ELG_END_DT,A.ELG_IND,A.MA_DDCT_BAL_AMT,A.PYMT_AMT,A.PYMT_BEG_DT,A.PYMT_END_DT,A.PYMT_TYP,A.SC_BNFT_LVL_CD,A.UPDT_DT,A.VFCN_DUE_DT,A.MSG_CD_TXT,A.PGM_RQST_SW,A.NF_FAIL_RSN_1_CD,A.PREV_SC_BNFT_L_CD,A.EMPL_VFCN_DUE_DT,A.INS_VFCN_DUE_DT,A.SMIRF_MO,B.FST_NAM, B.SEX_IND,B.BRTH_DT,B.MCI_ID FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG A, ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV B WHERE A.BNFT_CASE_NUM =? AND A.ELG_IND =? AND B.BNFT_PIN_NUM = A.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND B.DTH_DT = '9999-12-31'
SELECT FMA_RQST_IND, FPW_RQST_IND,FS_RQST_IND, EBD_RQST_IND, HC_RQST_IND, CLA_RQST_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~APP_PGM_RQST WHERE APP_NUM = ?
SELECT HC_ENRL_STAT_CD FROM ~SCHEMA~HC_ENRL WHERE APP_NUM = ?

SELECT A.APP_NUM, C.APP_STAT_CD, C.CP_WLST_STAT_CD, DATE(C.APP_CPLT_TMS) AS APP_CPLT_DATE, B.HC_ENRL_STAT_CD, B.HNA_STAT_CD,B.HMO_SEL_STAT_CD, B.FEE_RQR_MET_IND, B.FEE_STAT_CD, B.UPDT_DT, B.UPDT_DT, C.APP_ABDN_IND, A.FMA_RQST_IND, A.FPW_RQST_IND, A.FS_RQST_IND, A.EBD_RQST_IND, A.HC_RQST_IND, A.CLA_RQST_IND, A.CC_RQST_IND, B.HC_TYP, C.UPDT_DT AS APP_RQST_UPDT_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~APP_PGM_RQST A, ~SCHEMA~APP_RQST C LEFT OUTER JOIN ~SCHEMA~HC_ENRL B ON C.APP_NUM = B.APP_NUM WHERE C.APP_NUM = A.APP_NUM AND A.APP_NUM IN (?) WITH UR

SELECT A.APP_NUM, B.APP_TYP, B.CASE_NUM, B.STAT_CD, DATE(B.SBMT_TMS) AS APP_SBMS_DATE, A.FMA_RQST_IND, A.FPW_RQST_IND, A.FS_RQST_IND, A.EBD_RQST_IND, A.HC_RQST_IND, A.CLA_RQST_IND, A.CC_RQST_IND, B.SMF_CC_DE_RQST_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~APP_PGM_RQST A, ~SCHEMA~RMB_RQST B LEFT OUTER JOIN ~SCHEMA~APP_RQST C ON B.APP_NUM = C.APP_NUM WHERE B.APP_NUM = A.APP_NUM AND B.CASE_NUM = ? AND B.STAT_CD !='PE' WITH UR
SELECT A.APP_NUM, A.APP_TYP, A.CASE_NUM, A.STAT_CD FROM ~SCHEMA~RMB_RQST A, ~SCHEMA~APP_USER B WHERE B.ACS_ID = ? AND B.APP_NUM = A.APP_NUM AND A.APP_TYP IN('APA') WITH UR
SELECT A.APP_NUM, A.APP_TYP, A.CASE_NUM, A.STAT_CD FROM ~SCHEMA~RMB_RQST A, ~SCHEMA~APP_USER B WHERE B.ACS_ID = ? AND B.APP_NUM = A.APP_NUM AND A.APP_TYP IN('RMB','SMF') WITH UR

SELECT A.APP_NUM, A.APP_TYP, A.CASE_NUM, A.STAT_CD, B.FMA_RQST_IND, B.FS_RQST_IND, B.CC_RQST_IND, B.CLA_RQST_IND, B.FPW_RQST_IND, B.EBD_RQST_IND, DATE(A.SBMT_TMS) AS APP_CPLT_DATE, C.HC_ENRL_STAT_CD, C.HNA_STAT_CD, C.HMO_SEL_STAT_CD, C.FEE_STAT_CD, C.FEE_RQR_MET_IND, C.HC_TYP, C.UPDT_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~RMB_RQST A, ~SCHEMA~APP_PGM_RQST B LEFT OUTER JOIN ~SCHEMA~HC_ENRL C ON C.APP_NUM = B.APP_NUM WHERE A.APP_NUM IN(?) AND B.APP_NUM = A.APP_NUM WITH UR

SELECT DISTINCT BNFT_CASE_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG WHERE BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND CAT_CD = 'CC' AND BNFT_STAT_CD = 'O' AND PYMT_END_DT >= PYMT_BEG_DT AND ((CUR_ELG_IND = '1') OR (CUR_ELG_IND IN ('1','9') AND PYMT_END_DT >= ?)) WITH UR
SELECT APP_NUM, APP_STAT_CD, INDV_SEQ_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~BCB_PLAN_DET WHERE APP_NUM IN (?) WITH UR
SELECT BNFT_PIN_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV_CASE WHERE BNFT_PIN_NUM IN (?) ORDER BY PRIM_PRSN_SW DESC WITH UR
SELECT DISTINCT(APP_NUM) FROM ~SCHEMA~APP_IN_CP_WLST WHERE APP_NUM IN (?) WITH UR

SELECT NEXT_STEPS_TRK_NUM,APP_NUM,APP_TYP,BCB_INDV_1_STAT_CD,BCB_INDV_2_STAT_CD,CASE_NUM,DOC_SBMS_STAT_CD,FEE_STAT_CD,HC_ENRL_NUM,HMO_STAT_CD,HNA_STAT_CD,NEHNA_STAT_CD,NEXT_STEPS_STAT_CD FROM ~SCHEMA~NEXT_STEPS_PRFL WHERE APP_NUM IN(?) WITH UR
SELECT APP_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~APP_USER WHERE ACS_ID = ?
SELECT MCI_ID,EFF_BEG_DT,EFF_END_DT,HISTORY_CD,MCO_NAM,MCO_PHN_NUM,UPDT_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~IC_INDV_MCO_DET WHERE MCI_ID IN(?)ORDER BY HISTORY_CD DESC
SELECT MCI_ID,DDCT_BAL_AMT,DDCT_BAL_AMT_IND,EFF_END_DT,SPND_DOWN_AMT_IND,SPND_DOWN_BAL_AMT,UPDT_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~IC_INDV_SC_ELG WHERE MCI_ID IN(?)
SELECT A.MCI_ID, A.CAT_CD, A.SCAT_CD, A.CUR_ELG_IND, A.EFF_BEG_DT, A.EFF_END_DT, A.UPDT_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~IC_INDV_ELG A WHERE A.MCI_ID = ? AND A.CAT_CD = ? ORDER BY A.EFF_BEG_DT ASC

select CAT_CD, BNFT_STAT_CD, ELG_END_DT, BNFT_PIN_NUM, ELG_IND, case when (ELG_BEG_DT < current date or ELG_BEG_DT = '9999-12-31') then current date else ELG_BEG_DT end as ELG_BEG_DT from ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG where BNFT_CASE_NUM =? and CUR_ELG_IND in('0', '1')
select APP_NUM from ~SCHEMA~APP_RQST where APP_NUM in(select APP_NUM from ~SCHEMA~APP_USER where ACS_ID= ?) AND APP_STAT_CD in('ME','MP','CL')

SELECT A.BNFT_PIN_NUM,A.BNFT_CASE_NUM,A.CAT_CD,A.SCAT_CD,A.ORIG_ELG_IND,A.SCAT_SEQ_NUM,A.CUR_ELG_IND,A.BNFT_STAT_CD,A.CNFM_DT,A.ELG_BEG_DT,A.ELG_END_DT,A.ELG_IND,A.MA_DDCT_BAL_AMT,A.PYMT_AMT,A.PYMT_BEG_DT,A.PYMT_END_DT,A.PYMT_TYP,A.SC_BNFT_LVL_CD,A.UPDT_DT,A.VFCN_DUE_DT,A.MSG_CD_TXT,A.PGM_RQST_SW,A.NF_FAIL_RSN_1_CD,A.PREV_SC_BNFT_L_CD,A.EMPL_VFCN_DUE_DT,A.INS_VFCN_DUE_DT,A.SMIRF_MO,A.SMIRF_ACTN_CD,B.FST_NAM, B.SEX_IND,B.BRTH_DT,B.MCI_ID,A.FS_GRP_TYP,A.AG_STAT_RSN_1_CD,A.AG_STAT_RSN_2_CD,A.AG_STAT_RSN_3_CD FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG A, ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV B WHERE A.BNFT_CASE_NUM =? AND (A.CUR_ELG_IND = '1' OR (A.CUR_ELG_IND = '9' AND A.ELG_END_DT >= current date AND A.ELG_END_DT != '9999-12-31')) AND (A.ELG_IND =? OR (ELG_END_DT >= CURRENT DATE AND ELG_END_DT != '9999-12-31'))AND B.BNFT_PIN_NUM = A.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND B.DTH_DT = '9999-12-31'

SELECT CAT_CD, BNFT_STAT_CD, ELG_END_DT, BNFT_PIN_NUM, ELG_IND, case when (ELG_BEG_DT < current date or ELG_BEG_DT = '9999-12-31') then current date else ELG_BEG_DT end as ELG_BEG_DT from ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG where BNFT_CASE_NUM =? and CUR_ELG_IND in('9') and ELG_END_DT != '9999-12-31' and ELG_BEG_DT < current date with ur;
SELECT DISTINCT(BNFT_CASE_NUM) FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG WHERE BNFT_PIN_NUM = ? WITH UR

SELECT A.BNFT_PIN_NUM, A.BRTH_DT, A.FST_NAM, A.LAST_NAM, A.MID_INIT, A.SEX_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV A INNER JOIN ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV_CASE B ON A.BNFT_PIN_NUM = B.BNFT_PIN_NUM WHERE B.BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? ORDER BY B.PRIM_PRSN_SW DESC, A.BRTH_DT WITH UR
SELECT 1 FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV_CASE WHERE BNFT_PIN_NUM = ? AND BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? WITH UR
SELECT INDV_SEQ_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~BAT_INDV WHERE BAT_NUM = ? AND PIN_NUM = ? WITH UR
SELECT CASE_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~DOC_BAT WHERE BAT_NUM = ? WITH UR

SELECT B.INDV_SEQ_NUM,A.PRF_TYP,TRIM(A.CNTE_MGR_DOC_ID) AS DOC_ID,A.STAT_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~BAT_INDV_DOC A, ~SCHEMA~BAT_INDV B WHERE A.BAT_NUM = ? AND B.PIN_NUM = ? AND A.INDV_SEQ_NUM = B.INDV_SEQ_NUM AND A.BAT_NUM = B.BAT_NUM WITH UR;

SELECT TRIM(A.CNTE_MGR_DOC_ID) AS DOC_ID,A.INDV_SEQ_NUM,TRIM(B.FST_NAM) AS FIRST_NAME,TRIM(B.LAST_NAM) AS LAST_NAME,A.PRF_TYP,A.STAT_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~BAT_INDV_DOC A,~SCHEMA~BAT_INDV B WHERE A.BAT_NUM = ? AND A.BAT_NUM = B.BAT_NUM AND A.INDV_SEQ_NUM = B.INDV_SEQ_NUM WITH UR;
UPDATE ~SCHEMA~BAT_INDV_DOC SET CMT_TXT = ? WHERE CNTE_MGR_DOC_ID = ?;
SELECT MAX(PRF_SEQ_NUM) AS PRF_SEQ_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~BAT_INDV_DOC WHERE BAT_NUM = ? AND INDV_SEQ_NUM = ? WITH UR;

SELECT BAT_NUM,INDV_SEQ_NUM,PRF_SEQ_NUM,DOC_SEQ_NUM,CNTE_MGR_DOC_ID,CWW_STAT_CD,DOC_CD,ECF_STAT_CD,PRF_SUB_TYP,PRF_TYP,STAT_IND,OTSTD_VFCN_TXT,PRF_DSC,CMT_TXT FROM ~SCHEMA~BAT_INDV_DOC WHERE CNTE_MGR_DOC_ID = ? WITH UR
select distinct CNTE_MGR_DOC_ID from ~SCHEMA~BAT_INDV_DOC where BAT_NUM =? and STAT_IND = 'R' with ur;
UPDATE ~SCHEMA~DOC_BAT SET STAT_CD = ? WHERE BAT_NUM = ?
UPDATE ~SCHEMA~BAT_INDV_DOC SET stat_ind = ? WHERE BAT_NUM = ?
SELECT * FROM ~SCHEMA~DOC_BAT WHERE BAT_NUM = ? AND STAT_CD = 'IP' WITH UR

SELECT BNFT_PIN_NUM,BNFT_CASE_NUM,INDV_ACS_LVL_CD,VLD_LIVE_ARNG_FLG,CASE_MODE_CD,CASE_STAT_IND,PRIM_PRSN_SW,UPDT_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV_CASE WHERE BNFT_PIN_NUM = ? ORDER BY INDV_ACS_LVL_CD desc, BNFT_CASE_NUM WITH UR

SELECT A.BNFT_PIN_NUM, A.BNFT_CASE_NUM, A.CAT_CD, A.SCAT_CD, A.SCAT_SEQ_NUM, A.CUR_ELG_IND, A.PYMT_BEG_DT, A.BNFT_STAT_CD, A.CNFM_DT, A.ELG_BEG_DT, A.ELG_END_DT, A.ELG_IND, A.PGM_RQST_SW, A.PYMT_END_DT, A.UPDT_DT, CHAR (CASE WHEN A.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'O' THEN 1 WHEN A.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'P' THEN 2 WHEN A.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'M' THEN 3 WHEN A.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'C' THEN 4 WHEN A.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'D' THEN 5END) AS PRTY1, CHAR (CASE WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M02' THEN 1 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'BCLA' THEN 2 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'CTS' THEN 3 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'CC' THEN 4 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M08' THEN 5 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M01' THEN 6 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M03' THEN 7 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M12' THEN 8 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'FS' THEN 9 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M07' THEN 10 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M04' THEN 11 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M06' THEN 12 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M05' THEN 13 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M11' THEN 14 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'SC' THEN 15 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M13' THEN 16 END) AS PRTY FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG A WHERE A.BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND A.SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','CTSZ','CTSX','WW X')AND A.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'O'AND MONTH(A.PYMT_BEG_DT) = MONTH(CURRENT DATE) UNION SELECT B.BNFT_PIN_NUM, B.BNFT_CASE_NUM, B.CUR_ELG_IND, B.PYMT_BEG_DT, B.BNFT_STAT_CD, B.CNFM_DT, B.ELG_BEG_DT, B.ELG_END_DT, B.ELG_IND, B.PGM_RQST_SW, B.PYMT_END_DT, B.UPDT_DT, WHEN B.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'D' THEN 5 END) AS PRTY1, CHAR (CASE WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M02' THEN 1 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'BCLA' THEN 2 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'CTS' THEN 3 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'CC' THEN 4 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M08' THEN 5 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M01' THEN 6 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M03' THEN 7 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M12' THEN 8 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'FS' THEN 9 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M07' THEN 10 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M04' THEN 11 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M06' THEN 12 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M05' THEN 13 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M11' THEN 14 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'SC' THEN 15 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M13' THEN 16 END) AS PRTY FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG B WHERE B.BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND B.SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','CTSZ','CTSX','WW X') AND B.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'P' AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG C WHERE B.BNFT_CASE_NUM = C.BNFT_CASE_NUM AND C.CAT_CD = B.CAT_CD AND C.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'O' AND C.CAT_CD = B.CAT_CD AND C.PYMT_BEG_DT = B.PYMT_BEG_DT)UNION SELECT D.BNFT_PIN_NUM, D.BNFT_CASE_NUM, D.CAT_CD, D.SCAT_CD, D.SCAT_SEQ_NUM, D.CUR_ELG_IND, D.PYMT_BEG_DT, D.BNFT_STAT_CD, D.CNFM_DT, D.ELG_BEG_DT, D.ELG_END_DT,D.ELG_IND, D.PGM_RQST_SW, D.PYMT_END_DT, D.UPDT_DT, CHAR (CASE WHEN D.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'O' THEN 1 WHEN D.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'P' THEN 2 WHEN D.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'M' THEN 3 WHEN D.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'C' THEN 4 WHEN D.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'D' THEN 5 END) AS PRTY1,CHAR (CASE WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M02' THEN 1 WHEN D.CAT_CD ='BCLA' THEN 2 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'CTS' THEN 3 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'CC' THEN 4 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M08' THEN 5 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M01' THEN 6 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M03' THEN 7 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M12' THEN 8 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'FS' THEN 9 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M07' THEN 10 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M04' THEN 11 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M06' THEN 12 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M05' THEN 13 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M11' THEN 14 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'SC' THEN 15 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M13' THEN 16 END) AS PRTY FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG D WHERE D.BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND D.SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','CTSZ','CTSX','WW X')AND D.BNFT_STAT_CD IN('D','C') AND D.PYMT_BEG_DT BETWEEN ((CURRENT_DATE + 1 MONTH) - (DAY(CURRENT_DATE)-1) DAYS - 3 MONTH) AND ((CURRENT_DATE + 1 MONTH) - (DAY(CURRENT_DATE)-1) DAYS - 1 MONTH) AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG E WHERE D.BNFT_CASE_NUM = E.BNFT_CASE_NUM AND D.CAT_CD = E.CAT_CD AND D.BNFT_STAT_CD IN('O', 'P') AND D.CAT_CD = E.CAT_CD AND D.PYMT_BEG_DT = E.PYMT_BEG_DT) ORDER BY PRTY1, PRTY, ELG_END_DT WITH UR
SELECT BNFT_CASE_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INFO_RSTC WHERE BNFT_CASE_NUM IN (?) WITH UR

SELECT DISTINCT(A.BNFT_PIN_NUM),A.PRIM_PRSN_SW, B.BRTH_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV_CASE A, ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV B WHERE A.BNFT_PIN_NUM IN (?) AND A.BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND A.BNFT_PIN_NUM = B.BNFT_PIN_NUM ORDER BY A.PRIM_PRSN_SW DESC, B.BRTH_DT WITH UR

SELECT A.BNFT_PIN_NUM, A.BNFT_CASE_NUM, A.CAT_CD, A.SCAT_CD, A.SCAT_SEQ_NUM, A.CUR_ELG_IND, A.PYMT_BEG_DT, A.BNFT_STAT_CD, A.CNFM_DT, A.ELG_BEG_DT, A.ELG_END_DT, A.ELG_IND, A.VFCN_DUE_DT, A.PGM_RQST_SW, A.PYMT_END_DT, A.UPDT_DT, A.SMIRF_MO, A.SMIRF_ACTN_CD, A.FS_GRP_TYP, A.AG_STAT_RSN_1_CD, A.AG_STAT_RSN_2_CD, A.AG_STAT_RSN_3_CD, A.NF_ELG_RSLT_CD, A.NF_FAIL_RSN_1_CD, A.NF_FAIL_RSN_2_CD, A.NF_FAIL_RSN_3_CD, A.ORIG_ELG_IND, SMALLINT (CASE WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M02' THEN 1 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M50' THEN 2 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'CTS' THEN 3 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'CC' THEN 4 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M08' THEN 5 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M01' THEN 6 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M03' THEN 7 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M12' THEN 8 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'FS' THEN 9 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M07' THEN 10 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M04' THEN 11 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M06' THEN 12 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M05' THEN 13 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M11' THEN 14 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'SC' THEN 15 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M13' THEN 16 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'WW' THEN 17 END) AS PRTY FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG A, ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV B WHERE A.BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND A.BNFT_PIN_NUM = B.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND B.DTH_DT = '9999-12-31' AND A.SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','WW X','CTSZ','CTSX','MA Z', 'MA X','BC X','BC Z','FS X','FS Z','CC X','CC Z') AND A.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'O' AND A.CUR_ELG_IND IN('1','9') AND A.PYMT_BEG_DT <= A.PYMT_END_DT AND A.ELG_IND = 'E' AND A.PYMT_BEG_DT <= CURRENT DATE AND A.PYMT_END_DT >= CURRENT DATE ORDER BY PRTY, A.SCAT_SEQ_NUM WITH UR

SELECT A.BNFT_PIN_NUM, A.BNFT_CASE_NUM, A.CAT_CD, A.SCAT_CD, A.SCAT_SEQ_NUM, A.CUR_ELG_IND, A.PYMT_BEG_DT, A.BNFT_STAT_CD, A.CNFM_DT, A.ELG_BEG_DT, A.ELG_END_DT, A.ELG_IND, A.VFCN_DUE_DT, A.PGM_RQST_SW, A.PYMT_END_DT, A.UPDT_DT, A.SMIRF_MO, A.SMIRF_ACTN_CD, A.FS_GRP_TYP, A.AG_STAT_RSN_1_CD, A.AG_STAT_RSN_2_CD, A.AG_STAT_RSN_3_CD,A.NF_ELG_RSLT_CD, A.NF_FAIL_RSN_1_CD, A.NF_FAIL_RSN_2_CD, A.NF_FAIL_RSN_3_CD, A.ORIG_ELG_IND, SMALLINT (CASE WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M02' THEN 1 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M50' THEN 2 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'CTS' THEN 3 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'CC' THEN 4 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M08' THEN 5 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M01' THEN 6 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M03' THEN 7 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M12' THEN 8 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'FS' THEN 9 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M07' THEN 10 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M04' THEN 11 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M06' THEN 12 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M05' THEN 13 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M11' THEN 14 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'SC' THEN 15 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'M13' THEN 16 WHEN A.CAT_CD = 'WW' THEN 17 END) AS PRTY FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG A, ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV B WHERE A.BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND A.BNFT_PIN_NUM = B.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND B.DTH_DT = '9999-12-31' AND A.SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','WW X','CTSZ','CTSX','MA Z', 'MA X','BC X','BC Z','FS X','FS Z','CC X','CC Z') AND A.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'O' AND A.CUR_ELG_IND IN('1','9') AND A.PYMT_BEG_DT <= A.PYMT_END_DT AND A.ELG_IND = 'E' AND A.PYMT_BEG_DT <= CURRENT DATE AND A.PYMT_END_DT >= CURRENT DATE AND (EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG C WHERE C.BNFT_CASE_NUM = A.BNFT_CASE_NUM AND C.BNFT_PIN_NUM = ? AND C.CAT_CD = A.CAT_CD AND C.SCAT_SEQ_NUM = A.SCAT_SEQ_NUM AND C.CUR_ELG_IND IN('1','9') AND C.PYMT_BEG_DT <= C.PYMT_END_DT AND C.ELG_IND = 'E' AND C.PYMT_BEG_DT <= CURRENT DATE AND C.PYMT_END_DT >= CURRENT DATE ) OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG D WHERE D.BNFT_CASE_NUM = A.BNFT_CASE_NUM AND D.CAT_CD = 'WW' AND D.CAT_CD = A.CAT_CD AND D.SCAT_SEQ_NUM = A.SCAT_SEQ_NUM AND D.CUR_ELG_IND IN('1','9') AND D.PYMT_BEG_DT <= D.PYMT_END_DT AND D.ELG_IND = 'E' AND D.PYMT_BEG_DT <= CURRENT DATE AND D.PYMT_END_DT >= CURRENT DATE ) ) ORDER BY PRTY, A.SCAT_SEQ_NUM WITH UR

SELECT B.BNFT_PIN_NUM, B.BNFT_CASE_NUM, B.CAT_CD, B.SCAT_CD, B.SCAT_SEQ_NUM, B.CUR_ELG_IND, B.PYMT_BEG_DT, B.BNFT_STAT_CD, B.CNFM_DT, B.ELG_BEG_DT, B.ELG_END_DT, B.ELG_IND, B.VFCN_DUE_DT, B.PGM_RQST_SW, B.PYMT_END_DT, B.UPDT_DT, B.SMIRF_MO, B.SMIRF_ACTN_CD, B.FS_GRP_TYP, B.AG_STAT_RSN_1_CD, B.AG_STAT_RSN_2_CD, B.AG_STAT_RSN_3_CD,B.NF_ELG_RSLT_CD, B.NF_FAIL_RSN_1_CD, B.NF_FAIL_RSN_2_CD, B.NF_FAIL_RSN_3_CD, B.ORIG_ELG_IND, SMALLINT (CASE WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M02' THEN 1 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M50' THEN 2 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'CTS' THEN 3 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'CC' THEN 4 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M08' THEN 5 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M01' THEN 6 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M03' THEN 7 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M12' THEN 8 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'FS' THEN 9 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M07' THEN 10 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M04' THEN 11 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M06' THEN 12 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M05' THEN 13 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M11' THEN 14 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'SC' THEN 15 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M13' THEN 16 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'WW' THEN 17 END) AS PRTY FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG B, ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV A WHERE B.BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND B.BNFT_PIN_NUM = A.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND A.DTH_DT = '9999-12-31' AND B.SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','WW X','CTSZ','CTSX','MA Z', 'MA X','BC X','BC Z','FS X','FS Z','CC X','CC Z') AND B.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'P' AND B.CUR_ELG_IND = '0' AND B.PYMT_BEG_DT <= B.PYMT_END_DT AND ((B.PYMT_BEG_DT <= CURRENT DATE AND B.PYMT_END_DT >= CURRENT DATE) OR (B.ELG_BEG_DT <= CURRENT DATE AND B.ELG_END_DT >= CURRENT DATE)) AND B.ELG_IND != 'X' AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG C WHERE B.BNFT_CASE_NUM = C.BNFT_CASE_NUM AND C.SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','WW X','CTSZ','CTSX','MA Z', 'MA X','BC X','BC Z','FS X','FS Z','CC X','CC Z') AND C.CAT_CD = B.CAT_CD AND C.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'O' AND C.CUR_ELG_IND IN('1','9') AND C.PYMT_BEG_DT <= C.PYMT_END_DT AND C.ELG_IND = 'E' AND C.PYMT_BEG_DT <= B.PYMT_BEG_DT AND C.PYMT_END_DT >= B.PYMT_END_DT ) ORDER BY PRTY ASC WITH UR

SELECT B.BNFT_PIN_NUM, B.BNFT_CASE_NUM, B.CAT_CD, B.SCAT_CD, B.SCAT_SEQ_NUM, B.CUR_ELG_IND, B.PYMT_BEG_DT, B.BNFT_STAT_CD, B.CNFM_DT, B.ELG_BEG_DT, B.ELG_END_DT, B.ELG_IND, B.VFCN_DUE_DT, B.PGM_RQST_SW, B.PYMT_END_DT, B.UPDT_DT, B.SMIRF_MO, B.SMIRF_ACTN_CD, B.FS_GRP_TYP, B.AG_STAT_RSN_1_CD, B.AG_STAT_RSN_2_CD, B.AG_STAT_RSN_3_CD,B.NF_ELG_RSLT_CD, B.NF_FAIL_RSN_1_CD, B.NF_FAIL_RSN_2_CD, B.NF_FAIL_RSN_3_CD, B.ORIG_ELG_IND, SMALLINT (CASE WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M02' THEN 1 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M50' THEN 2 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'CTS' THEN 3 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'CC' THEN 4 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M08' THEN 5 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M01' THEN 6 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M03' THEN 7 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M12' THEN 8 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'FS' THEN 9 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M07' THEN 10 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M04' THEN 11 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M06' THEN 12 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M05' THEN 13 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M11' THEN 14 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'SC' THEN 15 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M13' THEN 16 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'WW' THEN 17 END) AS PRTY FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG B, ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV A WHERE B.BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND B.BNFT_PIN_NUM = ? AND B.BNFT_PIN_NUM = A.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND A.DTH_DT = '9999-12-31' AND B.SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','WW X','CTSZ','CTSX','MA Z', 'MA X','BC X','BC Z','FS X','FS Z','CC X','CC Z') AND B.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'P' AND B.CUR_ELG_IND = '0' AND B.PYMT_BEG_DT <= B.PYMT_END_DT AND ((B.PYMT_BEG_DT <= CURRENT DATE AND B.PYMT_END_DT >= CURRENT DATE) OR (B.ELG_BEG_DT <= CURRENT DATE AND B.ELG_END_DT >= CURRENT DATE)) AND B.ELG_IND != 'X' AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG C WHERE B.BNFT_CASE_NUM = C.BNFT_CASE_NUM AND C.BNFT_PIN_NUM = B.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND C.CAT_CD = B.CAT_CD AND C.SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','WW X','CTSZ','CTSX','MA Z', 'MA X','BC X','BC Z','FS X','FS Z','CC X','CC Z') AND C.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'O' AND C.CUR_ELG_IND IN('1','9') AND C.PYMT_BEG_DT <= C.PYMT_END_DT AND C.ELG_IND = 'E' AND C.PYMT_BEG_DT <= B.PYMT_BEG_DT AND C.PYMT_END_DT >= B.PYMT_END_DT ) ORDER BY PRTY WITH UR

SELECT B.BNFT_PIN_NUM, B.BNFT_CASE_NUM, B.CAT_CD, B.SCAT_CD, B.SCAT_SEQ_NUM, B.CUR_ELG_IND, B.PYMT_BEG_DT, B.BNFT_STAT_CD, B.CNFM_DT, B.ELG_BEG_DT, B.ELG_END_DT, B.ELG_IND, B.VFCN_DUE_DT, B.PGM_RQST_SW, B.PYMT_END_DT, B.UPDT_DT, B.SMIRF_MO, B.SMIRF_ACTN_CD, B.FS_GRP_TYP, B.AG_STAT_RSN_1_CD, B.AG_STAT_RSN_2_CD, B.AG_STAT_RSN_3_CD,B.NF_ELG_RSLT_CD, B.NF_FAIL_RSN_1_CD, B.NF_FAIL_RSN_2_CD, B.NF_FAIL_RSN_3_CD, B.ORIG_ELG_IND, SMALLINT (CASE WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M02' THEN 1 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M50' THEN 2 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'CTS' THEN 3 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'CC' THEN 4 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M08' THEN 5 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M01' THEN 6 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M03' THEN 7 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M12' THEN 8 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'FS' THEN 9 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M07' THEN 10 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M04' THEN 11 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M06' THEN 12 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M05' THEN 13 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M11' THEN 14 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'SC' THEN 15 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M13' THEN 16 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'WW' THEN 17 END) AS PRTY FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG B, ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV A WHERE B.BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND B.BNFT_PIN_NUM = A.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND A.DTH_DT = '9999-12-31' AND B.SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','WW X','CTSZ','CTSX','MA Z', 'MA X','BC X','BC Z','FS X','FS Z','CC X','CC Z') AND B.BNFT_STAT_CD ='M' AND B.ELG_IND = 'E' AND B.ELG_END_DT >= CURRENT DATE - 3 MONTH AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG C WHERE B.BNFT_CASE_NUM = C.BNFT_CASE_NUM AND C.CAT_CD = B.CAT_CD AND C.SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','WW X','CTSZ','CTSX','MA Z', 'MA X','BC X','BC Z','FS X','FS Z','CC X','CC Z') AND ((C.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'O' AND C.CUR_ELG_IND IN('1','9') AND C.ELG_IND = 'E') OR(C.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'P' AND C.CUR_ELG_IND = '0') AND C.ELG_IND != 'X') AND C.PYMT_BEG_DT <= C.PYMT_END_DT AND C.PYMT_BEG_DT <= B.PYMT_BEG_DT AND C.PYMT_END_DT >= B.PYMT_END_DT ) ORDER BY PRTY, B.ELG_END_DT DESC WITH UR

SELECT B.BNFT_PIN_NUM, B.BNFT_CASE_NUM, B.CAT_CD, B.SCAT_CD, B.SCAT_SEQ_NUM, B.CUR_ELG_IND, B.PYMT_BEG_DT, B.BNFT_STAT_CD, B.CNFM_DT, B.ELG_BEG_DT, B.ELG_END_DT, B.ELG_IND, B.VFCN_DUE_DT, B.PGM_RQST_SW, B.PYMT_END_DT, B.UPDT_DT, B.SMIRF_MO, B.SMIRF_ACTN_CD, B.FS_GRP_TYP, B.AG_STAT_RSN_1_CD, B.AG_STAT_RSN_2_CD, B.AG_STAT_RSN_3_CD,B.NF_ELG_RSLT_CD, B.NF_FAIL_RSN_1_CD, B.NF_FAIL_RSN_2_CD, B.NF_FAIL_RSN_3_CD, B.ORIG_ELG_IND, SMALLINT (CASE WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M02' THEN 1 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M50' THEN 2 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'CTS' THEN 3 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'CC' THEN 4 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M08' THEN 5 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M01' THEN 6 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M03' THEN 7 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M12' THEN 8 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'FS' THEN 9 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M07' THEN 10 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M04' THEN 11 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M06' THEN 12 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M05' THEN 13 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M11' THEN 14 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'SC' THEN 15 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'M13' THEN 16 WHEN B.CAT_CD = 'WW' THEN 17 END) AS PRTY FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG B, ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV A WHERE B.BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND B.BNFT_PIN_NUM = ? AND B.BNFT_PIN_NUM = A.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND A.DTH_DT = '9999-12-31' AND B.SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','WW X','CTSZ','CTSX','MA Z', 'MA X','BC X','BC Z','FS X','FS Z','CC X','CC Z') AND B.BNFT_STAT_CD ='M' AND B.ELG_IND = 'E' AND B.ELG_END_DT >= CURRENT DATE - 3 MONTH AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG C WHERE B.BNFT_CASE_NUM = C.BNFT_CASE_NUM AND C.BNFT_PIN_NUM = B.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND C.CAT_CD = B.CAT_CD AND C.SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','WW X','CTSZ','CTSX','MA Z', 'MA X','BC X','BC Z','FS X','FS Z','CC X','CC Z') AND ((C.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'O' AND C.CUR_ELG_IND IN('1','9') AND C.ELG_IND = 'E') OR(C.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'P' AND C.CUR_ELG_IND = '0') AND C.ELG_IND != 'X') AND C.PYMT_BEG_DT <= C.PYMT_END_DT AND C.PYMT_BEG_DT <= B.PYMT_BEG_DT AND C.PYMT_END_DT >= B.PYMT_END_DT ) ORDER BY PRTY, B.ELG_END_DT DESC WITH UR

SELECT D.BNFT_PIN_NUM, D.BNFT_CASE_NUM, D.CAT_CD, D.SCAT_CD, D.SCAT_SEQ_NUM, D.CUR_ELG_IND, D.PYMT_BEG_DT, D.BNFT_STAT_CD, D.CNFM_DT, D.ELG_BEG_DT, D.ELG_END_DT,D.ELG_IND, D.VFCN_DUE_DT, D.PGM_RQST_SW, D.PYMT_END_DT, D.UPDT_DT, D.SMIRF_MO, D.SMIRF_ACTN_CD, D.FS_GRP_TYP, D.AG_STAT_RSN_1_CD, D.AG_STAT_RSN_2_CD, D.AG_STAT_RSN_3_CD,D.NF_ELG_RSLT_CD, D.NF_FAIL_RSN_1_CD, D.NF_FAIL_RSN_2_CD, D.NF_FAIL_RSN_3_CD, D.ORIG_ELG_IND, SMALLINT (CASE WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M02' THEN 1 WHEN D.CAT_CD ='M50' THEN 2 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'CTS' THEN 3 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'CC' THEN 4 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M08' THEN 5 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M01' THEN 6 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M03' THEN 7 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M12' THEN 8 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'FS' THEN 9 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M07' THEN 10 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M04' THEN 11 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M06' THEN 12 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M05' THEN 13 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M11' THEN 14 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'SC' THEN 15 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M13' THEN 16 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'WW' THEN 17 END) AS PRTY, SMALLINT (CASE WHEN D.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'C' THEN 1 WHEN D.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'D' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END) AS PRTY2 FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG D, ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV A WHERE D.BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND D.BNFT_PIN_NUM = A.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND A.DTH_DT = '9999-12-31' AND D.SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','CTSZ','MA Z','BC Z','FS Z','CC Z') AND (D.BNFT_STAT_CD IN('D','C') OR D.ELG_IND IN('X','I')) AND D.CUR_ELG_IND IN('1','9') AND D.PYMT_BEG_DT <= D.PYMT_END_DT AND D.PYMT_BEG_DT BETWEEN ((CURRENT_DATE) - (DAY(CURRENT_DATE)-1) DAYS - 3 MONTH) AND CURRENT_DATE AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG E WHERE E.BNFT_CASE_NUM = D.BNFT_CASE_NUM AND E.CAT_CD = D.CAT_CD AND E.SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','WW X','CTSZ','CTSX','MA Z', 'MA X','BC X','BC Z','FS X','FS Z','CC X','CC Z') AND ((E.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'O' AND E.CUR_ELG_IND IN('1','9') AND E.ELG_IND = 'E' AND E.CAT_CD != 'WW') OR(E.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'M' AND E.CUR_ELG_IND IN('1','9') AND E.ELG_IND = 'E') OR(E.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'P' AND E.CUR_ELG_IND = '0' AND E.ELG_IND != 'X')) AND E.PYMT_BEG_DT <= E.PYMT_END_DT AND E.PYMT_BEG_DT <= D.PYMT_BEG_DT AND E.PYMT_END_DT >= D.PYMT_END_DT ) ORDER BY PRTY, PRTY2 WITH UR

SELECT D.BNFT_PIN_NUM, D.BNFT_CASE_NUM, D.CAT_CD, D.SCAT_CD, D.SCAT_SEQ_NUM, D.CUR_ELG_IND, D.PYMT_BEG_DT, D.BNFT_STAT_CD, D.CNFM_DT, D.ELG_BEG_DT, D.ELG_END_DT,D.ELG_IND, D.VFCN_DUE_DT, D.PGM_RQST_SW, D.PYMT_END_DT, D.UPDT_DT, D.SMIRF_MO, D.SMIRF_ACTN_CD, D.FS_GRP_TYP, D.AG_STAT_RSN_1_CD, D.AG_STAT_RSN_2_CD, D.AG_STAT_RSN_3_CD,D.NF_ELG_RSLT_CD, D.NF_FAIL_RSN_1_CD, D.NF_FAIL_RSN_2_CD, D.NF_FAIL_RSN_3_CD, D.ORIG_ELG_IND, SMALLINT (CASE WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M02' THEN 1 WHEN D.CAT_CD ='M50' THEN 2 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'CTS' THEN 3 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'CC' THEN 4 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M08' THEN 5 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M01' THEN 6 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M03' THEN 7 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M12' THEN 8 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'FS' THEN 9 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M07' THEN 10 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M04' THEN 11 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M06' THEN 12 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M05' THEN 13 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M11' THEN 14 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'SC' THEN 15 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'M13' THEN 16 WHEN D.CAT_CD = 'WW' THEN 17 END) AS PRTY, SMALLINT (CASE WHEN D.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'C' THEN 1 WHEN D.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'D' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END) AS PRTY2 FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG D, ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV A WHERE D.BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND D.BNFT_PIN_NUM = ? AND D.BNFT_PIN_NUM = A.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND A.DTH_DT = '9999-12-31' AND D.SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','CTSZ','MA Z','BC Z','FS Z','CC Z') AND (D.BNFT_STAT_CD IN('D','C') OR D.ELG_IND IN('X','I')) AND D.CUR_ELG_IND IN('1','9') AND D.PGM_RQST_SW = 'Y' AND D.PYMT_BEG_DT <= D.PYMT_END_DT AND D.PYMT_BEG_DT BETWEEN ((CURRENT_DATE) - (DAY(CURRENT_DATE)-1) DAYS - 3 MONTH) AND CURRENT_DATE AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG E WHERE E.BNFT_CASE_NUM = D.BNFT_CASE_NUM AND E.BNFT_PIN_NUM = D.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND E.CAT_CD = D.CAT_CD AND E.SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','WW X','CTSZ','CTSX','MA Z', 'MA X','BC X','BC Z','FS X','FS Z','CC X','CC Z') AND ((E.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'O' AND E.CUR_ELG_IND IN('1','9') AND E.ELG_IND = 'E') OR(E.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'M' AND E.CUR_ELG_IND IN('1','9') AND E.ELG_IND = 'E') OR(E.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'P' AND E.CUR_ELG_IND = '0') AND E.ELG_IND != 'X') AND E.PYMT_BEG_DT <= E.PYMT_END_DT AND E.PYMT_BEG_DT <= D.PYMT_BEG_DT AND E.PYMT_END_DT >= D.PYMT_END_DT ) ORDER BY PRTY, PRTY2 WITH UR

SELECT DISTINCT(A.BNFT_PIN_NUM), B.FST_NAM, B.LAST_NAM, B.BRTH_DT, A.PRIM_PRSN_SW FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV_CASE A, ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV B WHERE BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND A.BNFT_PIN_NUM = B.BNFT_PIN_NUM ORDER BY A.PRIM_PRSN_SW DESC, B.BRTH_DT WITH UR
SELECT FST_NAM, LAST_NAM FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV A WHERE BNFT_PIN_NUM = ? WITH UR
SELECT CASE_ID_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~ACS_USER WHERE WAMS_INTL_USER_ID = ? AND BNFT_RGST_IND = 'Y' AND (CASE_ID_NUM > 0 OR MCI_ID > 0)

SELECT DISTINCT A.BNFT_CASE_NUM, A.CAT_CD, A.SCAT_SEQ_NUM, A.PEND_SEQ_NUM, A.NTCE_TYP, A.VFCN_TYP, A.OTSTD_VFCN_TXT, B.VFCN_DUE_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_IN_PEND_VFCN A, ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG B WHERE A.BNFT_CASE_NUM IN (?) AND A.SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','WW X','CTSZ','CTSX','MA Z', 'MA X','BC X','BC Z','FS X','FS Z','CC X','CC Z') AND B.BNFT_CASE_NUM = A.BNFT_CASE_NUM AND B.CAT_CD = A.CAT_CD AND B.SCAT_SEQ_NUM = A.SCAT_SEQ_NUM AND B.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'P' AND B.PYMT_BEG_DT <= B.PYMT_END_DT AND B.ELG_IND !='X' AND A.VFCN_IND != 'F' AND ( (B.PYMT_BEG_DT <= CURRENT DATE AND B.PYMT_END_DT >= CURRENT DATE) OR (B.ELG_BEG_DT <= CURRENT DATE AND B.ELG_END_DT >= CURRENT DATE AND B.BNFT_STAT_CD = 'P') ) ORDER BY A.BNFT_CASE_NUM, A.CAT_CD, B.VFCN_DUE_DT, A.NTCE_TYP WITH UR

SELECT DISTINCT A.BNFT_CASE_NUM, A.BNFT_PIN_NUM, A.VFCN_TYP, A.NTCE_TYP, A.RT_KEY_CD, A.NTCE_TXT, A.OTSTD_VFCN_TXT FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_IN_PEND_VFCN A WHERE A.BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND A.NTCE_TYP = 'P' AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM ~SCHEMA~BAT_INDV B, ~SCHEMA~BAT_INDV_DOC C, ~SCHEMA~DOC_BAT D WHERE B.PIN_NUM = A.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND B.BAT_NUM = C.BAT_NUM AND C.INDV_SEQ_NUM = B.INDV_SEQ_NUM AND C.PRF_TYP = A.VFCN_TYP AND TRIM(C.NTCE_TXT) = TRIM(A.NTCE_TXT) AND (TRIM(C.OTSTD_VFCN_TXT) = TRIM(A.OTSTD_VFCN_TXT) OR LOCATE(A.OTSTD_VFCN_TXT, C.OTSTD_VFCN_TXT) > 0) AND C.STAT_IND IN ('C','D') AND TRIM(A.RT_KEY_CD) = TRIM(C.PRF_DSC) AND D.BAT_NUM = C.BAT_NUM AND D.CASE_NUM = A.BNFT_CASE_NUM AND D.STAT_CD IN('PR','PE','EX','ST','PX') AND D.CHNL_IND IN('M','A') AND DATE(D.SBMT_TMS) > (CURRENT DATE - ? DAYS) ) WITH UR

SELECT DISTINCT A.BNFT_CASE_NUM, A.BNFT_PIN_NUM, A.VFCN_TYP, A.NTCE_TYP, A.RT_KEY_CD, A.NTCE_TXT, A.OTSTD_VFCN_TXT FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_IN_PEND_VFCN A WHERE A.BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND A.BNFT_PIN_NUM = ? AND A.NTCE_TYP = 'P' AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM ~SCHEMA~BAT_INDV B, ~SCHEMA~BAT_INDV_DOC C, ~SCHEMA~DOC_BAT D WHERE B.PIN_NUM = A.BNFT_PIN_NUM AND B.BAT_NUM = C.BAT_NUM AND C.INDV_SEQ_NUM = B.INDV_SEQ_NUM AND C.PRF_TYP = A.VFCN_TYP AND TRIM(C.NTCE_TXT) = TRIM(A.NTCE_TXT) AND (TRIM(C.OTSTD_VFCN_TXT) = TRIM(A.OTSTD_VFCN_TXT) OR LOCATE(A.OTSTD_VFCN_TXT, C.OTSTD_VFCN_TXT) > 0) AND C.STAT_IND IN ('C','D') AND TRIM(A.RT_KEY_CD) = TRIM(C.PRF_DSC) AND D.BAT_NUM = C.BAT_NUM AND D.CASE_NUM = A.BNFT_CASE_NUM AND D.STAT_CD IN('PR','PE','EX','ST','PX') AND D.CHNL_IND IN('M','A') AND DATE(D.SBMT_TMS) > (CURRENT DATE - ? DAYS) ) WITH UR

SELECT BNFT_PIN_NUM, BNFT_CASE_NUM, CAT_CD, SCAT_CD, SCAT_SEQ_NUM, CUR_ELG_IND, PYMT_BEG_DT, BNFT_STAT_CD, CNFM_DT, ELG_BEG_DT, ELG_END_DT, ELG_IND, VFCN_DUE_DT, PGM_RQST_SW, PYMT_END_DT, UPDT_DT, SMIRF_MO, SMIRF_ACTN_CD, FS_GRP_TYP, AG_STAT_RSN_1_CD, AG_STAT_RSN_2_CD, AG_STAT_RSN_3_CD, NF_ELG_RSLT_CD, NF_FAIL_RSN_1_CD, NF_FAIL_RSN_2_CD, NF_FAIL_RSN_3_CD, ORIG_ELG_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG WHERE (BNFT_CASE_NUM IN(?) OR BNFT_PIN_NUM = ? OR (BNFT_CASE_NUM IN(?) AND CAT_CD = 'WW')) AND BNFT_CASE_NUM NOT IN(?) AND SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','CTSZ','MA Z','BC Z','FS Z','CC Z') AND PYMT_BEG_DT <= PYMT_END_DT ORDER BY BNFT_CASE_NUM WITH UR

SELECT BNFT_PIN_NUM, BNFT_CASE_NUM, CAT_CD, SCAT_CD, SCAT_SEQ_NUM, CUR_ELG_IND, PYMT_BEG_DT, BNFT_STAT_CD, CNFM_DT, ELG_BEG_DT, ELG_END_DT, ELG_IND, VFCN_DUE_DT, PGM_RQST_SW, PYMT_END_DT, UPDT_DT, SMIRF_MO, SMIRF_ACTN_CD, FS_GRP_TYP, AG_STAT_RSN_1_CD, AG_STAT_RSN_2_CD, AG_STAT_RSN_3_CD, NF_ELG_RSLT_CD, NF_FAIL_RSN_1_CD, NF_FAIL_RSN_2_CD, NF_FAIL_RSN_3_CD, ORIG_ELG_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG WHERE (BNFT_PIN_NUM = ? OR (BNFT_CASE_NUM IN(?) AND CAT_CD = 'WW')) AND BNFT_CASE_NUM NOT IN(?) AND SCAT_CD NOT IN('WW Z','CTSZ','MA Z','BC Z','FS Z','CC Z') AND PYMT_BEG_DT <= PYMT_END_DT ORDER BY BNFT_CASE_NUM WITH UR
SELECT DISTINCT CS_RFA_PRV_PIN_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~PAPRLS_CRSPD WHERE CS_RFA_PRV_PIN_NUM IN (?) AND CS_RFA_PRV_PIN_IND = 'C' AND DOC_CD = 'CVCL' AND MAIL_DT >= CURRENT DATE - 1 MONTH WITH UR
SELECT DISTINCT BNFT_CASE_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_INDV_CASE WHERE BNFT_CASE_NUM IN (?) WITH UR
SELECT MCI_ID, BRTH_DT, DTH_DT, FST_NAM, LAST_NAM, MID_INIT, SEX_IND, SFX_NAM, UPDT_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~IC_BNFT_INDV WHERE MCI_ID = ?
SELECT RFRSH_TMS FROM ~SCHEMA~IC_BNFT_INFO_RFRSH WHERE MCI_ID = ?

SELECT A.MCI_ID, A.CAT_CD, A.SCAT_CD, A.CUR_ELG_IND, A.EFF_BEG_DT, A.EFF_END_DT, A.UPDT_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~IC_INDV_ELG A WHERE A.MCI_ID = ? AND A.EFF_BEG_DT <= A.EFF_END_DT AND A.EFF_BEG_DT <= CURRENT DATE AND A.EFF_END_DT >= CURRENT DATE ORDER BY A.CAT_CD, A.EFF_BEG_DT DESC WITH UR

SELECT A.MCI_ID, A.CAT_CD, A.SCAT_CD, A.CUR_ELG_IND, A.EFF_BEG_DT, A.EFF_END_DT, A.UPDT_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~IC_INDV_ELG A WHERE A.MCI_ID = ? AND A.EFF_END_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM ~SCHEMA~IC_INDV_ELG B WHERE B.MCI_ID = A.MCI_ID AND B.CAT_CD = A.CAT_CD AND B.EFF_BEG_DT <= B.EFF_END_DT AND B.EFF_BEG_DT <= CURRENT DATE AND B.EFF_END_DT >= CURRENT DATE) ORDER BY A.CAT_CD, A.EFF_END_DT DESC WITH UR
SELECT 1 FROM ~SCHEMA~IC_INDV_ELG A WHERE A.MCI_ID = ? AND A.EFF_END_DT >= ? WITH UR
SELECT CASE_ID_NUM, SS_NUM, BNFT_PIN_NUM, BRTH_DT, BNFT_RGST_IND, MCI_ID FROM ~SCHEMA~ACS_USER WHERE WAMS_INTL_USER_ID = ? ORDER BY WAMS_INTL_USER_ID DESC WITH UR
SELECT * FROM ~SCHEMA~ACS_USER WHERE CASE_ID_NUM = ? ORDER BY WAMS_INTL_USER_ID DESC WITH UR
SELECT CAT_CD, VFCN_DUE_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG WHERE BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND CAT_CD in (?) WITH UR;

SELECT A.BNFT_PIN_NUM, A.BNFT_CASE_NUM, A.CAT_CD, A.SCAT_CD , A.RT_KEY_CD, A.RT_ID, A.VFCN_TYP, A.OTSTD_VFCN_TXT, A.NTCE_TXT,B.VFCN_DUE_DT FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_IN_PEND_VFCN A, ~SCHEMA~INDV_ELG B WHERE A.BNFT_CASE_NUM = ? AND A.BNFT_PIN_NUM IN (?) AND A.BNFT_CASE_NUM = B.BNFT_CASE_NUM AND A.CAT_CD = B.CAT_CD AND A.SCAT_CD = B.SCAT_CD AND A.SCAT_SEQ_NUM = B.SCAT_SEQ_NUM AND B.BNFT_STAT_CD IN ('P','C','D') AND A.NTCE_TYP = 'P' ORDER BY B.VFCN_DUE_DT,A.VFCN_TYP,A.NTCE_TXT,A.RT_KEY_CD,A.OTSTD_VFCN_TXT,A.BNFT_PIN_NUM WITH UR;

SELECT A.CASE_NUM,B.PIN_NUM,A.CHNL_IND, C.PRF_TYP,C.DOC_CD,C.NTCE_TXT,C.PRF_DSC,C.OTSTD_VFCN_TXT,C.CNTE_MGR_DOC_ID,DATE(A.SBMT_TMS) AS RECEIVEDDATE FROM ~SCHEMA~DOC_BAT A, ~SCHEMA~BAT_INDV B, ~SCHEMA~BAT_INDV_DOC C WHERE A.CASE_NUM = ? AND B.PIN_NUM IN (?) AND A.BAT_NUM = B.BAT_NUM AND A.BAT_NUM = C.BAT_NUM AND B.INDV_SEQ_NUM = C.INDV_SEQ_NUM AND C.STAT_IND = 'C' AND A.STAT_CD IN('PE','EX') AND DATE(A.SBMT_TMS) >= (CURRENT DATE - ? DAYS) ORDER BY A.CHNL_IND DESC WITH UR;
SELECT A.PRF_TYP,A.PRF_DSC,A.NTCE_TXT,A.OTSTD_VFCN_TXT,A.DOC_CD,B.CHNL_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~BAT_INDV_DOC A, ~SCHEMA~DOC_BAT B WHERE A.CNTE_MGR_DOC_ID='?' AND A.BAT_NUM = B.BAT_NUM WITH UR;

SELECT A.APP_NUM AS APP_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~RMB_RQST A, ~SCHEMA~APP_USER B WHERE B.ACS_ID = ? AND B.APP_NUM = A.APP_NUM AND A.APP_TYP IN('RMB','SMF', 'APA') AND A.STAT_CD != 'PE' UNION SELECT C.APP_NUM AS APP_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~APP_RQST C, ~SCHEMA~APP_USER D WHERE D.ACS_ID > 0 AND C.APP_NUM = D.APP_NUM AND D.ACS_ID = ? AND C.APP_STAT_CD != 'PE' UNION SELECT E.APP_NUM AS APP_NUM FROM ~SCHEMA~RMC_RQST E, ~SCHEMA~APP_USER F WHERE F.ACS_ID > 0 AND E.APP_NUM = F.APP_NUM AND F.ACS_ID = ? AND E.STAT_CD != 'PE' WITH UR;

SELECT A.CASE_NUM,B.PIN_NUM, C.PRF_TYP,C.DOC_CD,C.NTCE_TXT,C.PRF_DSC,C.OTSTD_VFCN_TXT FROM ~SCHEMA~DOC_BAT A, ~SCHEMA~BAT_INDV B, ~SCHEMA~BAT_INDV_DOC C WHERE A.CASE_NUM = ? AND B.PIN_NUM IN (?) AND A.BAT_NUM = B.BAT_NUM AND A.BAT_NUM = C.BAT_NUM AND B.BAT_NUM = C.BAT_NUM AND B.INDV_SEQ_NUM = C.INDV_SEQ_NUM AND C.STAT_IND IN ('C','D') AND A.CHNL_IND IN ('M','A') AND A.STAT_CD IN ('PE','PR','EX','PX') AND DATE(A.SBMT_TMS) >= (CURRENT DATE - ? DAYS) ORDER BY C.PRF_TYP,C.NTCE_TXT,C.PRF_DSC,C.OTSTD_VFCN_TXT,B.PIN_NUM WITH UR;
